Control Name: Reflects Management's Choices—Operations objectives reflect management's choices about structure, industry considerations, and performance of the entity.

control_attributes.Control: Reflects Management's Choices—Operations objectives reflect management's choices about structure, industry considerations, and performance of the entity.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC3.1 COSO Principle 6: The entity specifies objectives with sufficient clarity to enable the identification and assessment of risks relating to objectives.
